description.@value:
Ihre Appartements in Mayrhofen im Zillertal!
Unser neu renoviertes Appartementhaus im typischen Tiroler Stil liegt ideal – mitten im Zentrum Mayrhofens und dennoch in ruhiger Lage. Das Ortszentrum mit der Einkaufsstraße (Hauptstraße) ist in 3 Gehminuten erreichbar.
Auch die Einstiege zu den Gondelbahnen des Skigebietes Ski-Zillertal 3000 (Penken- und Ahornbahn) liegen in unmittelbarer Nähe und sind mit dem Skibus (Einstiegsstelle direkt vor dem Haus) in wenigen Minuten erreichbar.
Im Sommer finden unsere Gäste im großen Garten Erholung. Unseren Gästen stehen außerdem ausreichend Parkplätze sowie GRATIS W-Lan zur Verfügung.

Die Kreditkartendaten werden zur Sicherstellung gespeichert.
Wir bitten um Verständnis, dass wir für unsere Appartements eine Kaution in Höhe von 300€ erheben, welche Sie bei ordnungsgemäßer Nutzung der Wohnungen selbstverständlich zurück bekommen.

alle Preise inkl Mehrwertsteuer, Handtücher, Bettwäsche, Geschirrtücher, Spülmaschinentabs

Check in: ab 15 Uhr, Check out: bis 9 Uhr 
Sollten Sie früher anreisen oder später abreisen wollen bitten wir Sie, dies mit uns abzusprechen.

Tirolerhaus - Apartments in Mayrhofen
Our recently renovated traditional Tyrolean style apartment house is ideally located - right in the centre of Mayrhofen, yet in a quiet spot. The town centre with its main shopping street (Hauptstraße) is only three minutes walk away. Both the Penken and Ahorn cable cars are close by and accessible by ski bus in only a few minutes (bus stop right in front of the house)! 

Summer guests will enjoy using our garden for rest and relaxation. House guests also benefit from ample parking space and free Wi-Fi. 
Our “Tiroler Haus” was completely renovated in 2012. Our holiday apartments were built during the course of these refurbishments and lovingly furnished with great care and attention to detail.

Both apartments have spaciously planned and fully equipped kitchens that leave nothing to be desired!

Holiday in modern apartments
Our two apartments measure 83m² and 91m² respectively and each have room to accommodate 2 - 9 persons. Both apartments offer ample space to relax and enjoy a very pleasant holiday!
The apartment on the mezzanine floor has access to the garden; the apartment on the first floor has a wrap-round balcony.

Sleeping as desired
Double beds, separable beds, single beds, sofa beds - no matter whether you are travelling as a group with friends, as a family, or as couples - sleeping arrangements can be combined as required.

Holidays in Zillertal - an all year round success
Whether enjoying nature while summer hiking or an action-packed winter skiing holiday - the Zillertal Valley is a world famous tourist destination that offers great entertainment to suit every taste and season!

The Tirolerhaus in Mayrhofen - apartments to relax in
We look forward to meeting you and your stay with us. If you have any questions, please contact us under +43 664 50 84 768 or via our contact form!
If you already know this is where you want to stay, you can book your holiday conveniently and securely direct on our homepage.

Deposit:
We charge a deposit of € 300 for our apartments, which will of course be refunded at the end of your stay when no damages have occurred!

Children’s discounts!
0-5 years: free!
6-11 years: 50% (based on 5 full paying adults in the apartment)

Final cleaning charge
We charge a one-off final cleaning charge of € 70 per apartment!

Arrival and departure!
Arrival: from15 hrs!
Departure: by 10 hrs!

Payment!
Payment (rent, tourist tax, final cleaning) is to be made in cash on arrival day or if preferred, by bank transfer (by no later than 2 weeks before intended day of arrival)!

A little word of advice for the journey!
Tiroler Haus is best accessed via the “Einfahrt Mitte” turn-off for Mayrhofen. Drive straight on from there, over the main crossroads at the “Hauptstraße” and follow the road for another 200m. You will approach a colourfully painted, round building. Turn left, then straight ahead at the next junction, where you will enter the “Sportplatzstraße”. The first turn-off on the left is our driveway.

Unsere helle Ferienwohnung Luise befindet sich im Hochparterre und bietet Platz für 2-9 Personen.
Auf 83m2 befindet sich ein Vorraum, drei komfortable Schlafzimmer (zwei davon mit Sat-TV mit Flat-Screens), ein Badezimmer mit Dusche/WC, ein separates WC sowie eine moderne Wohnküche mit gemütlicher Sitzecke.
Sämtliche Doppelbetten sind trennbar und damit auch als Einzelbetten möglich!

Holiday Apartment Luise 
Holiday Apartment Luise is located on the mezzanine floor and can accommodate 2-9 persons. Measuring 83m², it consists of an entrance hall, three comfortable bedrooms (two of which with flat screen Sat-TV) a bathroom with shower/WC, a separate WC as well as a modern kitchen with comfortable seating area.

Unsere Ferienwohnung Franz befindet sich im 1. Stock. Mit einer Größe von 91m2 bietet sie Platz für 2-9 Personen. Die lichtdurchflutete Wohnung verfügt über 3 Schlafzimmer (eines davon mit Sat-TV mit Flat-Screen), einer großzügigen, modernen Wohnküche mit gemütlicher Sitzecke sowie Sat-TV mit Flat-Screen, einem Badezimmer mit Dusche und WC sowie einem Vorraum. Das Appartement Franz ist von einem großen Balkon umgeben.

Holiday Apartment Franz 
Holiday Apartment Franz is located on the 1st floor. Measuring 91m², it can accommodate 2-9 persons. The light and airy apartment has 3 bedrooms (one of which with flat screen Sat-TV), a large, modern kitchen with comfortable seating area and flat screen Sat-TV, a bathroom with shower and WC, as well as an entrance hall. Apartment Franz has a wrap-round balcony which is accessible from every room!
